---
title: "Free for All"
format: html
---

```{r}

library(leaflet)

img_width <- 3800
img_height <- 2400

leaflet(options = leafletOptions(
  crs = leafletCRS(crsClass = "L.CRS.Simple"),
  minZoom = -1,
  maxZoom = 2
))  |> 
  setView(lng = img_width / 2, lat = img_height / 2, zoom = 0) |> 
  fitBounds(0, 0, img_width, img_height)  |> 
  addImageOverlay(
    "media/Samgallery.jpg",
    bounds = list(c(0, 0), c(img_height, img_width)),  # Use pixel height/width here
    opacity = 1
  ) |> 
  addRectangles(
    lng1 = 2731, lat1 = 937,   # top-left corner (x1, y1)
  lng2 = 3134, lat2 = 1792,  # bottom-right corner (x2, y2)
  fillOpacity = 0,            # invisible rectangle but clickable
  stroke = FALSE,
  popup = 
    <img src='media/ENVS_40_Zine-1.png'>
  )
```
